ref.title: Ref
ref.description:
Primary reference code that identifies this item.
Additional codes can be provided in the 'identities' property.

key.title: Key
key.description: Special key used to classify the item sometimes required by some regimes.

identities.title: Identities
identities.description: List of additional codes, IDs, or SKUs which can be used to identify the item. They should be agreed upon between supplier and customer.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency used for the item's price.

price.title: Price
price.description: Base price of a single unit to be sold.

alt_prices.title: Alternative Prices
alt_prices.description:
AltPrices defines a list of prices with their currencies that may be used
as an alternative to the item's base price.

origin.title: Country of Origin
origin.description: Country code of where this item was from originally.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: Extension code map for any additional regime specific codes that may be required.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional meta information that may be useful

Item.description: Item is used to describe a single product or service.
